sentences.en: An intelligible gleam of assent twinkled in his eye.
sentences.cn: 一种会意的赞同的光彩闪现在他的眼睛里.

sentences.en: Do you - - does each of you -- accept this great trust [ Tumultuous assent ]?
sentences.cn: 请问大家 -- 请问各位 -- 是否接受这个 重托 呢(台下纷纷答应 )?

sentences.en: He gave his assent to the proposed legislation.
sentences.cn: 他批准了提请审议的法案。

sentences.en: Her only answer was a murmured assent.
sentences.cn: 她什么也没说,只答应了两声.

sentences.en: I assented to the request of the American publishers to write this book.
sentences.cn: 我同意了美国出版商们写这本书的请求。

sentences.en: I cannot assent to what you ask.
I couldn't assent to, much less participate in such proceeding.
sentences.cn: 我对于这种举动并不赞成, 哪里还谈得上参与呢.

sentences.en: It was in some strange way, a chilling smile, of assent.
sentences.cn: 他这一笑, 是一种令人毛骨悚然的冷笑, 是一种表示默认的冷笑.

sentences.en: Melville's disenchanted comment shows that it has never commanded total assent.
sentences.cn: 梅尔维尔清醒的看法却从未得到大家的同意.

sentences.en: My assent is given with a hook at the end.
My father will never assent to my spending a holiday abroad before I'm 16.
sentences.cn: 家父决不允许我在16岁前去国外度假.

sentences.en: She gave a nod of assent.
The director has given her assent to the proposals.
sentences.cn: 负责人已表示同意提案。

sentences.en: The new bill passed by Parliament has received Royal Assent.
sentences.cn: 议会所通过的新方案已获国王批准.

sentences.en: With a word of assent, Chang Sheng departed.
sentences.cn: 张升答应一声就出去了.

trans.tran_en: approval or agreement from someone who has authority
approval or agreement from someone who has authority
to agree to a suggestion, idea etc after considering it carefully

trans.tran_cn: 赞成：赞成，如某建议，赞同
